sentences.english: Working together with one or more people to put together a killer presentation?
sentences.chinese: 想要和几个哥们一起捣鼓出一个杀手级的演示文稿？

sentences.english: He emended the typescript before sending it to the printers.
sentences.chinese: 在交付印刷之前他校正文稿。

sentences.english: Most drafts do not improve upon delivery.
sentences.chinese: 大多数文稿在表达的时候没有被改善。

sentences.english: Is not PPT something like a set of sharp knives?
sentences.chinese: 演示文稿有时候不正如一把利刃吗？

sentences.english: I wagged the pages in my hand, trying to devise further consolations.
sentences.chinese: 我把这些文稿拿在手里摇晃着，想给自己更多的慰藉。

sentences.english: Following review, second drafts should be available by end-August.
sentences.chinese: 经过审查后，第二次的文稿应该到8月底将是可用的。

sentences.english: We receive several new typescripts a day.
sentences.chinese: 我们一天收到几份打出的文稿。

sentences.english: The presentation will be in slideshow mode.
sentences.chinese: 演示文稿将以幻灯片模式显示。

sentences.english: The so-called text, means the Isle of Man original and unpublished manuscripts.
sentences.chinese: 所谓文本，系指马恩原著与未发表的文稿。

sentences.english: So it might be worth it to just try repairing the install of TypeScript.
sentences.chinese: 所以它可能是值得尝试修复安装的文稿。

sentences.english: To enable this command, paste a link into the active presentation.
sentences.chinese: 要激活该命令，请在当前演示文稿中贴入链接的对象。

sentences.english: At his death he left a great mass of undigested manuscripts.
sentences.chinese: 他去世时留下大量尚未整理的文稿。

sentences.english: This is a Chinese translation and refer to the English that follows the Chinese translation.
sentences.chinese: 本资料为中文翻译稿，请参考随后的英文稿。

definition: piece of writing submitted for publication/manuscript/article
